package step4;

 
public class LianXi_Sort {

	
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int t;

		 java.util.Scanner sc = new java.util.Scanner(System.in);
		//获取平台分配的x的值
		int x = sc.nextInt();
		//获取平台分配的y的值
		int y = sc.nextInt();
		//获取平台分配的z的值
		int z = sc.nextInt();
		if(x<y){
			if(x<z){
				if(z<y) {t = y; y = z; z = t;}            			
			}
			if(x>z){
				t = y; y = z; z = t;
				t = y; y = x; x = t;
			}
		}
		if(x>y){
			if(y<z){
				t = y; y = x; x = t;
			}
		}
        
		
		
        
		

        

		
	   


	    /**********end**********/
		System.out.print("x:"+x+" y:"+y+" z:"+z);
		
	}

}
